summary: American botanical expedition in the Himalayas stumbles across a Yeti den, capture one and transport it back to Los Angeles, where it escapes while customs officials are debating whether it is animal or human.
cast: Paul Langton|Leslie Denison|Teru Shimada|Rollin Moriyama|Robert Kino|Robert Hinton|Darlene Fields|George Douglas|Robert Bice|Keith Richards|Rudolph Anders|William Phipps|Jack Daly|Rusty Wescoatt|Lock Martin
keywords: psychotronic film|low budget sci fi movie|yeti|himalayas|sherpa
title: The Snow Creature
